post.body: I am beyond fail at Kriegspiel, but we should seriously play. When is a good time for you ? :)
Cigarettes ? Since when do you smoke ? You always gave me the impression you're more of the milk & cookies type !
@hzon: Regarding Mao: It's a point that comes with age. Anyone up for a game of http://tinyurl.com/6eoe67 ?
I am in bonn (or rather koenigswinter), up for a beer ?
Have fun at the airport. Back & running tomorrow ?
At some time in my life I must have absentmindedly signed a subscription for them. Ever since, they seem to seek me out.
Wenn man schon in Wien ist, kann man auch pseudointellektuelle Schwafelblaetter lesen ? *duck*
Symmetric crypto seminar.
You'll graduate with the BSc then, right ? Are you going to keep on studying or follow the siren song of security ?
Slides are good. I'd remove slides 42-49, they're oriented wrong. 53-109 are really good. How's the maths going ?
Got your package, 1000thx ! :)
Leuven is certainly a good address. You into symmetric, I presume ?
If you go to Leuven, I will drop by for beers. Each time there's a crypto meeting there, they get destroyed.
The paper is listing the constraints. Can't quite see which syscalls they allow tho.
Also, try to see if http://summerschool08.iaik.tugraz.at/ is happening again in 2009. It was awesome in 2007.
If google thinks overlapping code and so forth are the only problems they are facing, the deserve being barstooled.
Ahh...the joys of hash functions. A friend of mine and me always wanted to have some theory for ADD/XOR/ROL algebra...
@benhawkes Don't give the kid too much sugar, that's bad for growth !
Yeh, the ones that disappear when you look at them etc.
google 'precariat' for English explanations of the first term
it is a synthetic word compised of 'prekariat' (itself a neologism) and 'import' and refers to very unskilled immigration
Yes, I wear them quite a lot. Wore one yesterday teaching.
Late-night debugging with ero.
I know what I want for Christmas: An Image Fulgurator. Best invention of 2008. http://www.juliusvonbismarck.com/fulgurator/index.html
Debugging some python code.
From the same series: Fear those that intentionally overlook your mistakes, not those that point them out.
And for those who deem this too mellow: Jancee Pornick is back on tour: http://songza.com/z/xnj7uu "Land of 1000 Babushkas"
Since li5a is posting her music all the time: "The Einmarsch" playing "nicsee" http://songza.com/z/eqj9jh
From the series 'aphorisms for assholes': Those who cannot accept help from others will soon perceive all human beings as burden.
Out of 40 undergrads in my math exercise group 26 are female. That's encouraging ! Let's hope I don't lose too many of them.
Nursing a flu while watching Fassbender's "Third Generation"
Last day in Bonn. Sunrise over the Rhine is pretty damn beautiful.
I am in Bonn until Friday. Anyone up for Dinner tonight ?
Going to sleep.
Cursing the computer algebra package SAGE.
Praising the computer algebra package SAGE.
Yay I am going to Dagstuhl. But now ... uh ... where do I find something appropriate to talk about ? The attendees list scares me.
How come each personality test I have done in my life gave me a different result ? Typeanalyzer says my blog is ISTJ.
anyhow, time to do some sports and then read some old papers.
Crunching on my Dagstuhl lecture at university. Did I mention that the undergrad math crap eats too much time ? Back to office tomorrow.Yay!
li5a: Der hat jetzt Bachelor ? Dann wuensch ihm gute besserung *duck*
li5a: Dipl oder Doc ? Gruess den Bogk !
Work work work.
Did I mention that "The lost cafe" from indiscrete thoughts is a fascinating obituary ?
Listening to Jancee Pornick Casino's Song "Trotzky's last Margharita" before going to sleep. "Pute au crack" is next.
tired / jetlagged in ottawa. Hungry too. Should I go to sleep at 7pm and get up at 3am to at least get 8 hours of sleep ?
If I could only win the lottery as often as I run into impossible heisenbugs..
8am in Ottawa. Working of course ! :)
Hating the fact that so much software doesn't work. Building houses on quicksand.
dealing with way too large idbs
just in time for Xmas: caught a harsh flu. Just got done sleeping for 28 hours.
Had Feuerzangenbowle and crazy discussions with friends yesterday. Xmas can be cool.
Crazy (german) word of the week: prekariatsimport
Recovering from the Ottawa-DUS flight. Christmas market in front of my door. Might have to eat something sweet and dring Gluehwein.
In Ottawa, trying to be productive and not bored. Flight is at 9:50pm -- anyone up for lunch/dinner ?
